text: Marion Lorne MacDougall (also Marion Lorne; August 12, 1883 â€“ May 9, 1968) was an American television, stage and movie actress. She worked in theater in New York City and London, England. She made her first movie in 1951. She had had many small roles in movies or television during her career. She played Aunt Clara in Bewitched on television. Lorne was born in West Pittston, Pennsylvania. She died of a heart attack in New York City. == Other websites == * Category:Actors from Pennsylvania Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:1883 births Category:1968 deaths
title: Marion Lorne
